about_the_game: Cakewalk Mutant Revenge is a suite of 300 all new sounds for Z3TA+ 2 that equips modern music producers with a heavy round of sonic artillery for dance floor warfare. This library is loaded with blistering hot leads, epic build ups, disembodied pads, cosmic synthesis FX, and a platinum collection of huge low-end mutant bass patches.
detailed_description: Cakewalk Mutant Revenge is a suite of 300 all new sounds for Z3TA+ 2 that equips modern music producers with a heavy round of sonic artillery for dance floor warfare. This library is loaded with blistering hot leads, epic build ups, disembodied pads, cosmic synthesis FX, and a platinum collection of huge low-end mutant bass patches.
name: Z3TA+ 2 - Cakewalk Mutant Revenge Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista 32-bit/64-bit (SP2), Windows 7 32-bit/64-bit (SP1), Windows 8 32-bit/64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or newer processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x800 minimum resolution, 32-bit
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Expansion Pack for Z3TA+ 2. Requires Z3TA+ 2 which is available separately

This library is loaded with blistering hot leads, epic build ups, disembodied pads, cosmic synthesis FX, and a platinum collection of huge low-end mutant bass patches.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support
